message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a valuable asset, and I believe this price is fair considering its worth to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I am willing to pay $1,350,000 for it. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,350,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,375,000. This would still be a good deal for both of us. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $1,360,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.
